item: Fresh scallops, shrimp, mussels, and squid simmer with aromatic black mushrooms, and bok choy over a spread of clean bean noodles.
Slices of tender lamb sauteed with sweet basil green peppers, onions, and scallions in chef's special sauce.
Lightly deep-fried shrimps or scallops tossed in chef's creamy tasty sauce with steamed broccoli.

Salt Baked Shrimp, Scallops and Squid with Chili🌶️
Lightly deep-fried shrimps, scallops, squids tossed with chef's special salt and dry chili spice.
Lightly deep-fried fish sauteed in ginger, scallions, onions, and garlic in black bean paste.
Lightly deep-fried fish tossed with green peppers, onions, garlic with a touch of lemon juice in tangy hot sauce.
Thai Style Basil Chicken or Tofu🌶️
Lightly deep-fried chicken or tofu stir-fry with sweet basil, celery, onions, and ginger in chef's Thai spicy sauce.
Thai Style Basil Shrimp or Fish🌶️
Lightly deep-fried shrimp or fish stir-fry with sweet basil, celery, onions, and ginger in chef's Thai spicy sauce.
Temperature Hot Sizzling Plate (Beef, Chicken, or Pork)
Hot plate with grilled beef, chicken, or boneless pork chop sizzle with the choice of sauce: (1) Black Pepper Sauce, (2) Tomato Based Sauce, (3) Natural Herb Sauce.

Lightly deep-fried slices of lamb stir fry with a well-balance of aromatic cumin spice, onions, and dry chili.
Pork Chop with Chili and Spiced Salt🌶️
Lightly deep-fried pork chop tossed with garlic and scallions in a special chef's spiced salt with chili.
Lightly deep-fried chicken sauteed with green peppers, pineapples, and onions in chef's General sauce.
